content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 585.6 - Design and space requirements for family care homes

State Regulations
(a) Mobile homes or trailers shall not be
permitted for use as family care homes. (b) Each resident bedroom in a family care
home shall contain an individual bed, bureau, closet and sufficient space for
all furniture and resident passage therein. (c) Each resident bedroom shall contain at
least 70 square feet (exclusive of closets) for the first bed and at least 50
square feet (exclusive of closets) for each additional bed. (d) No resident shall share a bedroom with
more than one other person, except in homes certified prior to July 2006, in
which case the room capacity shall not exceed four persons. (e) Access and exit from any bedroom shall be
to a hall or corridor, and not through a bathroom, toilet room or another
bedroom. (f) There shall be a
minimum of one toilet, one lavatory and one tub or shower for each six persons
living in the family care home. (g) In addition to bedroom space, at least 30 square feet of space per person
residing in the home shall be provided for living, dining and recreational
activities. Dining space shall be furnished to provide for family group seating
during meals. Notes
